headline: A Look At Lennox International (LII) Valuation After Recent Share Price Moves
summary: Lennox International (LII) has drawn fresh attention after recent trading, with the stock closing at $525.25 and recording mixed return patterns over the past month and the past 3 months, prompting investors to reassess expectations. See our latest analysis for Lennox International. Over the past year, Lennox International's share price return has been positive year to date at 5.28%, while its 1 year total shareholder return of 15.93% decline contrasts with a very strong 3 year total...

headline: What Lennox International (LII)'s New Distribution Hub and Digital Tools Push Means For Shareholders
summary: Lennox International has recently expanded its commercial HVAC operations by opening a 763,000-square-foot Regional Distribution Center in Edgerton, Kansas, and enhancing its production footprint in Arkansas and Mexico to improve product availability and fulfillment speed across North America. The company is pairing this physical expansion with upgraded digital tools such as the relaunched Commercial Quick Quote platform, aiming to streamline emergency rooftop unit replacements and make...
